Wizbo.name: Wizbo
Wizbo.description:
<c=7d5bff>Wizbo</c>
 The framjificent!, Wizbo focuses on applying statuses, exhausting and adding cards to the deck

ReinforcedGate.name: ReinforcedGate
ReinforcedGate.description: The Gate (Missile Bay) of this castle has been reinforced to ward of hordes of fans.

FramjificentCore.name: FramjificentCore
FramjificentCore.description: Draw a card whenever you <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> a card

ParadoxGrimoire.name: ParadoxGrimoire
ParadoxGrimoire.description: Every 10th card you <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> grants 1 extra <c=energy>Energy</c> and <c=action>Draw</c> a card

Parallel Stabilizer.name: Parallel Stabilizer
Parallel Stabilizer.description: Gain <c=status>TableFlip</c> at the start of combat

Tower.name: Tower
Tower.description: This is a Framjificent Castle, but not very mobile <c=downside>Max Evade 4</c> <c=downside>No WarpPrep</c>

Hex.name: Hexbolt
Hex.description: Applies <c=cardtrait>Weak</c> to the enemy ship part hit and 2 <c=status>Missile Malfunction<c/>, never misses

Chaos.name: Chaosbolt
Chaos.description: 40% chance to apply 1 <c=status>Boost</c> 60% chance to apply 1 of <c=status>Heat, Corrode or Missile Malfunction<c/>, never misses

Magic.name: Magicbolt
Magic.description: Deals 1 damage to the enemy, never misses

Fire.name: Firebolt
Fire.description: Deals damage equal to the enemy's <c=status>Heat<c/> & applies 1 <c=status>Heat<c/>, never misses

Pholder.name: Pholder
Pholder.description: Applies <c=cardtrait>Weak</c> to the enemy ship part hit and 2 <c=status>Missile Malfunction<c/>, never misses

Chaos.name: Chaosball
Chaos.description: 40% chance to apply 2 <c=status>Boost</c> 60% chance to apply 2 of <c=status>Heat, Corrode or Missile Malfunction<c/> when destroyed, increases by 1 each turn; Selfdestructs in 3 turns

Fire.name: Fireball
Fire.description: Deals 2 Damage & applies 2 <c=status>Heat</c> when destroyed, increases by 1 every 2 turns; Selfdestructs in 3 turns

Toxic.name: Toxicball
Toxic.description: Applies 2 <c=status>Oxidation</c> when destroyed, increases by 1 each turn; Selfdestructs in 3 turns
